title: Corporate Sponsorship
copy: We are happy to craft a customized package to suit each sponsor’s unique business and philanthropic objectives. To start a conversation about sponsorship opportunities, please contact George Martin at gmartin@artic.edu .   The Art Institute would like to thank our sponsors:   Official Airline of the Art Institute of Chicago   Digital Engagement Sponsor of the Art Institute of Chicago   Corporate Sponsor of Annual Exhibitions of Japanese Prints   Corporate Sponsor for David Hockney: The Arrival of Spring, Normandy, 2020   Corporate Sponsor for Cezanne   Corporate Sponsors for The Obama Portraits National Sponsor   Lead Corporate Sponsor of the Chicago Presentation   Corporate Programming Sponsor   Corporate Sponsor for Monet and Chicago   Corporate Sponsor for Bisa Butler: Portraits   Corporate Sponsor for El Greco: Ambition and Defiance   To learn more about sponsorship opportunities, please contact the Institutional Philanthropy department at corporaterelations@artic.edu .
